analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Score 38 indicates a Defensive regime as downward momentum pushed the score from 44. DXY (Dollar strength) remains stable, but VIX (Volatility) creeping higher confirms risk-off sentiment. While caution prevails, geopolitical friction in the semiconductor sector over supply relocation creates a potential supply-side headwind. Investors should watch for support levels; until volatility subsides, a defensive posture is warranted.

reports.EN: GMS Score 38 indicates a Defensive regime as downward momentum pushed the score from 44. DXY (Dollar strength) remains stable, but VIX (Volatility) creeping higher confirms risk-off sentiment. While caution prevails, geopolitical friction in the semiconductor sector over supply relocation creates a potential supply-side headwind. Investors should watch for support levels; until volatility subsides, a defensive posture is warranted.
reports.ES: El GMS de 38 indica un rÃ©gimen defensivo, ya que el momentum a la baja empujÃ³ la puntuaciÃ³n desde 44. El DXY (fortaleza del dÃ³lar) se mantiene estable, pero el aumento del VIX (volatilidad) confirma la aversiÃ³n al riesgo. Las tensiones geopolÃ­ticas en semiconductores actÃºan como un lastre potencial. Se recomienda cautela mientras se prueban los niveles de soporte, manteniendo una postura defensiva hasta que la volatilidad se estabilice.

reports.ID: Skor GMS 38 menunjukkan rezim defensif karena momentum penurunan mendorong skor turun dari 44. DXY (kekuatan Dolar) stabil, namun kenaikan VIX (indeks ketakutan) mengonfirmasi sentimen risk-off. Ketegangan geopolitik terkait relokasi pasokan chip menjadi hambatan potensial bagi sektor teknologi. Investor perlu waspada saat pasar menguji level support; mempertahankan posisi defensif tetap menjadi prioritas hingga volatilitas mereda.

reports.FR: Le score GMS de 38 indique un rÃ©gime dÃ©fensif, le momentum baissier ayant poussÃ© le score sous les 44. Le DXY (force du dollar) est stable, mais la hausse du VIX (indice de peur) confirme l'aversion au risque. Les frictions gÃ©opolitiques liÃ©es aux semi-conducteurs constituent un frein potentiel.
